title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 5328.4 - Review of license determination
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 5328.4 - Review of license determination

State Regulations

Within 30 days of the denial of a casino alcoholic
beverage license, the applicant may submit a written request to the commission
for a review of such determination. The commission or its designee shall
confirm the denial or grant the application within 30 days of the request for
review. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
5328.4

Adopted

New

York State Register December 28, 2016/Volume XXXVIII, Issue 52, eff. 12/28/2016

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
